name: diana Coordination Tasks

assignedTasks.taskDescription:
Conduct comprehensive security audit of repository access controls and validation rules. Focus areas:
1. Authentication mechanisms
2. Authorization levels
3. Data validation rules
4. Access control vulnerabilities
5. Security best practices implementation
